markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 633 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.
name: Humanoid
